Title: Edit Script, of TMjs
script:
Once upon a time in a land far, far away, there was a kingdom. In this kingdom, there was a king who ruled with wisdom and kindness. His people were happy and prosperous.

However, one day, a terrible storm ravaged the land. The people were scared, and they looked to the king for guidance. The king, being wise and just, called upon his advisors to help him find a solution.

Together, they devised a plan to restore peace and prosperity to the kingdom. They rebuilt homes, planted new crops, and forged new alliances. Slowly but surely, the kingdom began to thrive once more.

And so, the people lived happily ever after, grateful for the wisdom and leadership of their beloved king.
